server.DAO

Class AbstractDAORoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.DAO.AbstractDAORoom
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SQLServerDAORoom

    public abstract class AbstractDAORoom
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the abstract class for the DAO room

      • closeConnection

        public abstract void closeConnection(java.sql.Connection connection)
        This method closes the connection with the data base
        Parameters:
        connection - the active connection.

      • createRoom

        public abstract int createRoom(java.lang.String name,
                               int capacity,
                               int building,
                               boolean hasProjector,
                               boolean hasComputer,
                               java.lang.String description)
        This method creates a room in the data base
        Parameters:
        name - : room name
        capacity - : room capacity
        building - : room building number
        hasProjector - : if the room has a projector
        hasComputer - : if the room has computers
        description - : small description of the room
        Returns:
        1 if the creation was successful, 0 otherwise.

      • searchAllRooms

        public abstract java.util.List<RoomType> searchAllRooms()
        This method returns the rooms list
        Returns:
        the list of rooms.

      • deleteRoom

        public abstract int deleteRoom(int id)
        This method deletes a room. It return an int to specify to the server the state of the deletion
        Parameters:
        id - : room id
        Returns:
        int who give the state of the deletion in the data base

      • updateRoom

        public abstract int updateRoom(int id,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               int capacity,
                               int building,
                               boolean hasProjector,
                               boolean hasComputer,
                               java.lang.String description)
        This method updates a room in the data base. It return an int to specify to the server the state of the updated.
        Parameters:
        id - : room id
        name - : room name
        capacity - : room capacity
        building - : room building number
        hasProjector - : if the room has a projector
        hasComputer - : if the room has computers
        description - : room description
        Returns:
        int who give the state of the updated in the data base
